unit.name: Wizard Lord
unit.description: Magic: A Wizard Lord is a Level 4 wizard. He must choose 1-2 PM and 2-4 BM spells from a single Lore of the 8 Lores of Magic. Equipment: Hand weapon. May take up to 100p of magic items. Special Rules: none.

equipment.name: Life BM Master of the Wood (6+)
Heaven PM Second Sign of Amul (5+)
Death BM Dark Hand of Death (5+)
Fire PM Flaming Sword of Rhuin (5+)
Beast BM Howl of the Beast (8+)
Metal BM Rule of Burning Iron (6+)
Metal BM Destillation of Molten Silver (9+)
Metal BM Spirit of the Forge (9+)

unit.name: Battle Wizard
unit.description: Magic: A Battle Wizard is a Level 2 wizard. He must choose 0-1 PM and 1- 2 BM spells from a single Lore of the 8 Lores of Magic. Equipment: Hand weapon. May take up to 50p of magic items. Special Rules: none.

equipment.name: Life BM Master of the Wood (6+)
Heaven PM Second Sign of Amul (5+)
Death BM Dark Hand of Death (5+)
Fire PM Flaming Sword of Rhuin (5+)
Beast BM Howl of the Beast (8+)
Metal BM Rule of Burning Iron (6+)
Metal BM Destillation of Molten Silver (9+)
Metal BM Spirit of the Forge (9+)

unit.name: Paymaster
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. May take up to 50p of magic items. Special Rules: Paymaster.

unit.name: Captain
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. May take up to 50p of magic items. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Pikeman
unit.description: Equipment: Pike and heavy armour. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Duellist
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Skirmishers, Block (Shield).

unit.name: Light Horseman
unit.description: Mount: Warhorse Equipment: Light armour. Special Rules: Light Cavalry. If unit is equipped with shields it loses the Light Cavalry special rule.

unit.name: Heavy Horseman
unit.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse Equipment: Lance, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Heavy Cavalry.

unit.name: PIRAZZOS LOST LEGION
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 5 Crossbowmen including the named Champion Pirazzo, a Standard bearer and a Musician, as well as 5 Pikemen. Equipment: Crossbowmen are equipped with crossbow and heavy armour. Pikemen are equipped with pike and heavy armour. Pirazzo is equipped with additional hand weapon, crossbow and heavy armour. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Mixed Formation.

unit.name: RICCOS REPUBLICAN GUARD
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 10 Pikemen including the named Champion Ricco, a Standard bearer and a Musician. Equipment: Pike and heavy armour. Ricco is equipped with additional hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment.

unit.name: LEOPOLDS LEOPARD COMPANY
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 10 Pikemen including the named Champion Leopold, a Standard bearer and a Musician. Equipment: Pike and heavy armour. Leopold is equipped with a pistol and heavy armour. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Immune to Psychology.

unit.name: THE ALCATANI FELLOWSHIP
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 10 Pikemen including the named Champion Roderigo, a Standard bearer and a Musician. Equipment: Pike and heavy armour. Roderigo is equipped with additional hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Stubborn.

unit.name: VESPEROS VENDETTA
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 5 Duellists including the named Champion Vespero. Equipment: Additional hand weapon and throwing knives. Vespero is equipped with additional hand weapon, throwing knives and the Mask of Death. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Skirmishers, Dodge (6+).

unit.name: MARKSMEN OF MIRAGLIANO
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 10 Marksmen including the named Champion Maximillian, a Standard bearer and a Musician. Equipment: Crossbow and light armour. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment.

unit.name: AL MUKTARS DESERT DOGS
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 5 Desert Dogs including the named Champion Al Muktar, the named Champion Sheikh Almed Shuffti, the Standard bearer (Ibn) and a Musician. Mount: Warhorse Equipment: Shield. Sheikh Almed Shuffti is equipped with a shield and the Scimitar of Dakisir. The Standard bearer has the Black Banner of the Muktarhin. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Light Cavalry.

unit.name: BRAGANZAS BESIEGERS
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 10 Besiegers including the named Champion Luca Braganza, a Standard bearer and a Musician. Equipment: Crossbow, heavy armour and pavise. Luca Braganza is equipped with a pistol, crossbow and heavy armour. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment

unit.name: VOLANDS VENATORS
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 5 Venators including the named Champion Voland, a Standard bearer and a Musician. Mount: Barded Warhorse Equipment: Lance, heavy armour and shield Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Heavy Cavalry.

unit.name: ANACONDAS AMAZONS
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 10 Amazons including the named Champion Anaconda, the Standard bearer (Colibri) and the Musician (Piranha). Equipment: Blades of the Old Ones and light armour Special Rules: Light Infantry, Ward Save (6+), Magical Attacks.

unit.name: Dwarf Warrior
unit.description: Equipment: Heavy armour. Special Rules: Dwarf.

unit.name: Dwarf Quarreller
unit.description: Equipment: Crossbow and light armour. Special Rules: Dwarf.

unit.name: Halfling Warrior
unit.description: Equipment: Spear, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Anti-Cav (Spear).

unit.name: Halfling Archer
unit.description: Equipment: Bow. Special Rules: Light Infantry.

unit.name: Ogre
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Fear.

unit.name: Norsca Marauder
unit.description: Equipment: Light armour and shield. Special Rules: Frenzy.

unit.name: Paymasters Guard
unit.description: Equipment: Halberd and heavy armour. Special Rules: Paymasters Guard.

unit.name: THE CURSED COMPANY
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 10 Fallen Soldiers including the named Champion Richter Kreugar, a Standard bearer and a Musician. Equipment: Shield and light armour. Richter Kreugar is equipped with a shield and heavy armour as well as his unholy sword Shadow and the Dark Gem of the Cursed. The Standard bearer has the Banner of Malediction. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Cursed Company, Undead, Standalone, Hatred (Undead) (Richter Kreugar only)

unit.name: RUGLUDS ARMOURED ORCS
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 10 Armoured Orcs including the named Champion Ruglud, the Standard bearer (Maggot) and a Musician. Equipment: Choppa, crossbow and heavy armour. The Standard bearer has the Armoured Banner. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Armoured Animosity, Greenskins, Ignore Greenskin Panic.

unit.name: OGLAH KHANS WOLFBOYZ
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 6 Wolfboyz including the named Champion Oglah Khan, a Standard bearer and a Musician. Mount: Wolf Equipment: Spear, bow, light armour and shield. Oglah Khan is equipped with spear, bow, light armour and shield as well as the Pelt of the Wulfag. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Light Cavalry, Greenskins, Minions

unit.name: BEORG BEARSTRUCK AND THE BEARMEN OF URSLO
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 10 Bearmen including the named Champion Beorg, the Standard bearer (Oerl the Young) and a Musician. Equipment: Light armour and shield. Beorg is equipped with only a hand weapon and the Bear-Fang Talisman. The Standard bearer has the Bear Banner. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Frenzy.

unit.name: GOLGFAGS OGRE
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 4 Ogres including the named Champion Golgfag, the Standard bearer (Skaff) and a Musician. Equipment: Additional hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Fear.

unit.name: LUMPIN CROOPS FIGHTING COCKS
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 10 Haflings including the named Champion Lumpin Croop, the Standard bearer (Ned Hamfist) and a Musician. Equipment: Bow. Lumpin Croop is equipped with bow and light armour. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Light Infantry, Scouts.

unit.name: LONG DRONGS SLAYER PIRATES
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 10 Slayer Pirates including the named Champion Long Drong, a Standard bearer and a Musician. Equipment: Slayer Pistols. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Unbreakable, Dwarf.

unit.name: Maneater
unit.description: Equipment: Light armour Special Rules: Fear, Immune to Psychology, Stubborn, Ragtag Unit.

unit.name: Cannon
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Crewmen. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Cannon.

unit.name: Halfling Hot Pot
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Halfling Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Halfling Hot Pot.

unit.name: TICHI-HUICHIS RAIDERS
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 6 Raiders including the named Champion Tichi-Huichi, a Standard bearer and a Musician. Mount: Horned One. Equipment: Spear and shield. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Scaly Skin (6+), Fear, Hit and Run, Thick Skinned, Poisoned Attacks (1), Cold Blooded.

unit.name: MENGIL MANHIDES MANFLAYERS
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 6 Manflayers including the named Champion Mengil Manhide, a Standard bearer and a Musician. Equipment: Great weapon, heavy armour and repeater crossbow. Mengil is equipped with a great weapon, heavy armour and repeater handbow. The Standard bearer has the Banner of Kalad. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Skirmishers, Hatred (High Elves), Scouts, Killing Blow, Manflayer.

unit.name: BIRDMEN OF CATRAZZA
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises 5 Birdmen including the named Champion Dadallo. Equipment: Light Crossbow. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Flying Skirmishers, In Flight Shooting.

unit.name: ASARNIL THE DRAGONLORD
unit.description: Ridden Monster: Asarnil counts as a character model and is riding the dragon Thalui-Sethai (monstrous mount). Equipment: Asarnil is equipped with a lance, heavy armour and shield as. well as the Dragonheart Amulet. Point Cost: 460p (160p for Asarnil, 300p for Thalui-Sethai). Special Rules: Legendary Regiment.

unit.name: BRONZINOS GALLOPER GUNS
unit.description: Legendary Regiment. Mount: Warhorse. Equipment: Heavy armour. Special Rules: Cavalry Artillery Master. Galloper Gun: Warmachine: 3 Crewmen. Equipment: Hand weapon and carthorse (included in the profile) Special Rules: Galloper Gun, Mobile.

unit.name: MALAKAI MAKAISSONS GOBLIN HEWER
unit.description: Legendary Regiment. Malakai Makkaison: Equipment: Great weapon and Dwarf Repeater Handgun. Special Rules: Dwarf, Unbreakable, Slayerengineer. Goblin Hewer: Warmachine: 3 Slayer Assistents. Equipment: Great weapon. Special Rules: Dwarf, Unbreakable, Goblin Hewer.

unit.name: GIANTS OF ALBION
unit.description: Legendary Regiment. The regiment comprises Hengus who counts as a character model as well as two Giants (Bologs and Cachtorr). Hengus: Magic: Hengus is a Level 2 wizard and has the spells Dark Fury PM2/5+, BM The Crows Feast and BM The Wolf Hunts from Lore of Beasts. Equipment: Hengus is equipped with the Oggum Staff. Special Rules: Druid of Albion. Giants: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Giant

unit.name: WITCH HUNTERS
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises the named Champion Johann van Hal and the named Champion Wilhelm Hasburg. Equipment: Johann is equipped with a brace of pistols as well as the Stake of Sigmar. Wilhelm is equipped with the Holy Staff and has the prayers Unbending Righteousness PM2/7+ and Hammer of Sigmar PM2/5+. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Skirmishers, MR (1), Immune to Psychology, Magical Attacks, Hatred (Skaven, Daemons and Undead), Devine Protection (Wilhelm only).

unit.name: GOTREK & FELIX
unit.description: Legendary Regiment: The unit comprises the named Champion Gotrek Gurnisson and the named Champion Felix Jaeger. Equipment: Gotrek is equipped with Gotreks Axe. Felix is equipped with light armour and the rune sword Karaghul. Special Rules: Legendary Regiment, Skirmishers, Unbreakable, Ward Save (4+), Gotreks Doom, Slayer (Gotrek only).

mount.name: Warhorse
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon Special Rules: none

mount.name: Pegasus
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon Special Rules: Flying Model, March Blocker

item.name: Beast BM Howl of the Beast (8+)
item.description: RIP, enemy units gain no benefit from Inspiring Presence and Hold Your Ground!

item.name: Beast BM Hunters Spear (9+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", 1 hit like bolt thrower (S6, no AS, D3 wounds, penetrates ranks)

item.name: Beast BM The Beast Cowers (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", target Cavalry unit, Monstrous Cavalry unit, Swarm, Chariot or a single ridden or unridden Monster may not move (other than to flee) until the end of their next movement phase. In addition any monster or mount in the unit will not attack for the duration of the spell.

item.name: Beast BM The Crows Feast (6+)
BM The Crows Feast
item.description: MM, Range 24", 2D6 S3 hits

item.name: Beast BM The Wolf Hunts (10+)
Shadow BM Unseen Lurker (10+)
BM The Wolf Hunts
item.description: Augment, Range 12". +Choose a point within line of sight of the target unit. The unit then moves up to 2D6" in the direction of that point (use the shortest path; the unit has to wheel and does not have to stop when it reaches the point, i.e. it can continue to move straight ahead). The unit is affected by terrain as normal. If it comes into contact with a unit or impassable terrain the unit stops 1" in front of it. +In addition the unit gets +2M until the casters next magic phase. +Each unit may only benefit from this spell once per magic phase.

item.name: Beast BM Vermin Tide (7+)
item.description: Magic Vortex. Place 3" template touching the caster then move the template 4D6" in any direction in the casters front arc. Every unit touched by the template (except caster) suffers 3D6 S2 hits.

item.name: Beast PM Dark Fury (5+)
Dark Fury PM2/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit rerolls towound rolls of natural 1s until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Beast PM The Bears Anger (4+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target character model with US1 gains +2A, +1S and +1T until the casters next magic phase. A model under the effect of this spell cannot use any weapons or shields.

item.name: Beast PM The Oxen Stands (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 72". Target friendly broken unit immediately rallies, even if below 25%.

item.name: Death BM Dark Hand of Death (5+)
Fire BM Fire Ball (5+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits

item.name: Death BM Doom and Darkness (9+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers a -3 modifier on all Ld based tests until casters next magic phase.

item.name: Death BM Soultaker (7+)
item.description: Target one enemy unit within 12", the unit suffers 1 wound with no AS, allocated like shooting. The caster gains 1 wound (up to a max. of double its original W) if the target lost the wound, i.e. wounds saved with ward saves cannot be drained but wounds regained by regeneration are eligible.

item.name: Death BM Walking Death (6+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit causes Fear. If it already causes Fear, unit causes Terror instead. Lasts until casters next magic phase

item.name: Death BM Wind of Death (9+)
Metal BM Destillation of Molten Silver (9+)
Fire BM Fiery Blast (9+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", 2D6 S4 hits

item.name: Death BM Wither (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 18", target unit suffers -1T and -1I until the start of the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Death PM Deathwish (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit becomes Immune to Fear, Terror and Panic until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Death PM Fate of Death (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit gets KB in cc. If the unit already has KB then the KB is improved to work on a 5+. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Fire BM Ash Storm (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers - 1M, -1WS, -1BS and -1I until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Fire BM Breath of Embers (8+)
item.description: Place the tear drop template touching the caster in its front arc and determine hits using the template rules. All models hit suffer a S4 hit. If the caster is in cc, select one enemy unit that is in btb with the caster, this unit suffers D6 S4 hits.

item.name: Fire BM Burning Head (8+)
item.description: Choose a point in the front arc of the caster then draw a straight 18" long line from the caster to that point. The burning head flies along this line until it reaches its end or hits impassable LOS blocking terrain. All models under the line (affected models are determined in the same way as for a cannon ball) suffer a S4 hit. Units that suffer at least one casualty have to take a panic test. Cannot be used if the caster, or the unit he is with, is engaged in cc.

item.name: Fire BM Wall of Fire (11+)
item.description: Direct Damage, Range 24", all hits are resolved with S4. Place a template of the size of the unit (or just a marker) on the unit. All models in the front rank have to test if they are hit by the template, Skirmishers suffer D3 hits instead. The spell lasts until the casters next magic phase. If the unit wants to move before the spells ends, it has to pass a Ld test or has to remain stationary. If the unit is forced to move (e.g. has to flee) or is Immune to Psychology it automatically passes the test. When the unit moves all models in the unit have to test if they are hit by the template and the spells ends after any hits have been resolved.

item.name: Fire PM Aqshys Blessing (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target warmachine (Type: WarM) gets the special rule Devestating for ranged attacks until the casters next magic phase. Devastating: Units that suffer one or more wounds from this attack must pass a panic test.

item.name: Fire PM Blazing Flames (7+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18". Units shooting at the target unit suffer -1BS (to a minimum of 0) for this attack. In addition each enemy model in BTB with the target unit receives a S3 hit in each players magic phase including the magic phase the spell is cast. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Fire PM Flaming Sword of Rhuin (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit gets +1 to to-hit rolls in cc until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Fire PM Forge Fire (5+)
Metal PM Forge Fire (5+)
item.description: Augment, Misfires of friendly warmachines within 12" have no effect other than that the warmachine does not shoot. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Heaven BM Blizzard (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 36", target unit suffers -1BS and -1WS as well as -1 to all Ld based tests until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Heaven BM Comet of Casandora (12+)
item.description: Direct Damage, Range 36". Place the center of the 3" template over a target unit within 36". If the target unit is not Immune to Psychologie, it has the option to become broken and immediately flee (2D6"/3D6") directly towards the nearest table edge. Any model hit by the template (see Templates in core rules) suffers a S5 hit, allocated like shooting.

item.name: Heaven BM Forked Lightning (6+)
item.description: MM, Range 36", D6 S4 hits

item.name: Heaven BM Portent of Far (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit rerolls natural 1s for to-hit and to-wound rolls until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Heaven BM Tornado (12+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24". Target unit is immediately moved D3+1" directly away from the caster and is turned to face in a random direction (determined by the Scatter Dice). If the unit contacts impassable terrain, the board edge or a unit it stops 1" in front of the obstacle.

item.name: Heaven BM Uranons Thunder Bolt (8+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits, noAS

item.name: Heaven PM Celestial Shield (5+)
Death PM Shroud of Darkness (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", 5+ Ward Save vs ranged attacks and spells until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Heaven PM Clairvoyance (3+)
item.description: Target one unit on the board. Your opponent has to reveal any hidden models and magic items (but not which model has them) in that unit.

item.name: Heaven PM Second Sign of Amul (5+)
item.description: The player gets D3 rerolls. Each reroll can be used to reroll one to-hit roll, to-wound roll, armour save, ward save or regeneration roll. Any rerolls not used at the end of the players turn are wasted.

item.name: Life BM Gift of Life (7+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18". Target model regains all lost wounds. In case of ridden monsters (/chariot) choose either the monster or its rider as the target.

item.name: Life BM Master of the Wood (6+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", D6 S4 AP(1) hits

item.name: Life BM Plague (11+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", RIP, When the spell is successfully cast as well as at the start of each players magic phase the target suffers D6 S3 no AS hits.

item.name: Life BM Regrowth (9+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gains Regeneration (4+) until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Life BM Strangle Root Curse (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers -1M, -1WS, -1BS and -1I until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Life BM Undergrowth (7+)
item.description: Hex or Augment, Range 18", target unit counts as being in difficult terrain and light cover until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Life PM Flesh of Stone (6+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets +1T until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Life PM Toxic Gift (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets Poisoned Attacks (1) (cc as well as shooting), until the casters next magic phase. If the unit already has Poisoned Attacks, increase its value by +1. Has no effect on magic items.

item.name: Life PM Wall of Vines (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit counts as defending a fence (on all sides). Lasts until the start of the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Light BM Burning Gaze (6+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits, target unit suffers -1BS until the casters next magic phase

item.name: Light BM Cleansing Flare (10+)
item.description: Each enemy unit within 12" suffers D6 S5 hits.

item.name: Light BM Dazzling Brightness (6+)
Shadow BM Phantasmagoria (6+)
item.description: Hex, Range 18", target unit suffers -2WS (to a minimum of 1) until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Light BM Guardian Light (9+)
item.description: Augment, Range 12". Target unit becomes Stubborn and Immune to Psychology until the casters next magic phase. If target unit is broken it immediately rallies instead, even if below 25%.

item.name: Light BM Phas Illumination (6+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24". Units that attack the target unit with ranged attacks reroll failed to hit rolls. Lasts until the end of turn.

item.name: Light BM Resurrection (9+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit gets D3 infantry models (US1) or 1 cavalry model (US2) back. Spell only works on unit type infantry and cavalry. Has no effect on character models. Units can only get models back up to the unit size they started the game with. Resurrected command group models return as common models of their unit.

item.name: Light Crossbow
item.description: Range 24", S3, AP (1)

item.name: Light PM Cure (7+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target model recovers one wound

item.name: Light PM Shield of Light (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets a Ward Save (5+) until next casters magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Light PM Speed of Light (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 12", unit gets +2M and +2I until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Metal BM Commandment of Brass (6+)
item.description: Hex, Range 36", target Warmachine or Chariot may not move (other than to flee) or shoot until the end of its next turn.

item.name: Metal BM Law of Gold (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", the player of the target unit has to nominate a magic item that is carried by any model in that unit, then roll a D6: 1-3 the magic item cannot be used until the casters next magic phase, 4-6 the magic item cannot be used for the rest of the game.

item.name: Metal BM Rule of Burning Iron (6+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", D6 S3 hits, no AS

item.name: Metal BM Spirit of the Forge (9+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit rerolls failed armour saves until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Metal BM Transmutation of Lead (7+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers -1 to-hit and -1 to-wound in cc as well as -1AS until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Metal PM Commandment of Steel (5+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets AP(1) (cc as well as shooting), until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on magic items.

item.name: Metal PM Iron Skin (5+)
item.description: Augment, all friendly units within 6" of the caster gain Scaly Skin (6+). Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: PM Hammer of Sigmar (5+)
Hammer of Sigmar PM2/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 12", unit gets +1 to towound rolls in cc until the casters next magic phase

item.name: PM Unbending Righteousness (7+)
Unbending Righteousness PM2/7+
item.description: Augment, caster and his unit become Stubborn until the casters next magic phase

item.name: Shadow BM Crown of Taidron (8+)
item.description: Each unit (friend or foe) within 12" suffers D6 S4 hits.

item.name: Shadow BM Pit of Shades (12+)
item.description: Direct Damage, Range 24", place the center of the 3" template within 24", for each hit (see Templates in core rules) the unit suffers a S4 hit, allocated like shooting. A unit that suffers at least one casualty halves its movement value until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Shadow BM Shades of Death (6+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit causes Fear. If it already causes Fear, unit causes Terror instead. Lasts until casters next magic phase.

item.name: Shadow BM Unnerving Whispers (8+)
item.description: Hex, Range 18", needs LOS, target unit must take a panic test (Units that are Immune to Psychology are immune to this spell).

item.name: Shadow PM Creeping Shadows (5+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", target unit cannot march until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Shadow PM Shadow Mist (6+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", 5+ Ward Save vs cc attacks until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Shadow PM Steed of Shadows (4+)
item.description: Augment, cast on itself or friendly character model on foot with US1 (in both cases) within 12", model may immediately make a 20" fly movement. This move can be used to leave cc but cannot be used to enter combat (i.e. charging is not possible).

item.name: Dwarf
item.description: - Dwarfen Magic Resistance: Enemy spells that target Dwarfen units suffer -1 to the casting roll. - Hatred (Greenskins): All Dwarfs hate all kind of Greenskins. - Relentless: All Dwarfs are allowed to march even when an enemy unit is within march blocking range (usually within 8").

item.name: Legendary Regiment
item.description: The regiment is unique. Legendary regiments are usually led into battle by a (or multiple) named champion(s). Named champions are treated as common champions in every respect. Unless noted otherwise, the named champion is equipped like the rest of the unit. Models with names in brackets are treated in every respect as common models of their kind.

item.name: Paymaster
item.description: The Paymaster counts as the BSB in every respect. Futher, friendly units within 12" gain a +1 bonus for panic tests. If the Paymaster is not on the table (for whatever reason), all friendly units suffer a -1 penalty for panic tests. The Paymaster may never be the army general.

item.name: Paymasters Guard
item.description: As long as a character model with the paymaster special rule is part of this unit, it is Stubborn.

item.name: Ragtag Unit
item.description: Each model in the unit may be equipped and fight with a different weapon, i.e. rank and file models in this unit do not have to use the same equipment. The controlling player decides which models are removed as casualties. In cc models that are in BTB have to be chosen first.

item.name: Brace of Handguns
Brace of Handguns (all)
item.description: Range 24", S4, AP(1), Multiple Shot (2), no penalty for moving and shooting as well as long range; may always Stand & Shoot, even if the enemy is within half charge distance. Count as additional hand weapon in cc.

item.name: Cannon
item.description: Cannon, Range 60", S10, no AS, D3 wounds

item.name: Cathayan Longsword
Cathayan Longsword (all)
item.description: +1WS, +1I, AP(1), cannot be combined with other weapons to count as additional hand weapon.

item.name: Halfling Hot Pot
item.description: Catapult, Range 6"-36", 3" Template, S3(3), AP (3).

item.name: Biting Blade
item.description: AP(1)

item.name: Crimson Lance
item.description: Lance with Killing Blow

item.name: Sea Serpent Daggers
item.description: Additional hand weapon, Poisoned Attacks (2)

item.name: Sword of Striking
item.description: +1 to hit rolls in cc

item.name: The Chained Hedgehog
item.description: Morning Star, AP (2)

item.name: Enchanted Shield
item.description: Shield that grants +2 AS

item.name: Gromril Cuirass
item.description: Armour that grants 4+ AS.

item.name: Krimwulfs Claw Shield
item.description: Shield. Enemies attacking the bearer in close combat suffer -1 to their to-hit rolls.

item.name: Montis Iron Shield
item.description: Shield, bearer ignores first hit suffered in battle.

item.name: Enchanted Amulet
item.description: Ward Save (5+), MR2

item.name: Jons Citrin Talisman
item.description: The first time in the game, the bearer suffers one or more wounds (after saves), reduce the number of wounds suffered by 1 (down to a minimum of 0). The wound saved in this way does not count towards combat resolution.

item.name: Lucky Charm
item.description: Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Trollroot Brew
item.description: Regeneration (4+), Stupidity

item.name: Veteran Seal
item.description: To-wound rolls of 1 and 2 always fail to wound this model.

item.name: Alchemists Orb
item.description: Can be used in the Shooting Phase instead of a missile weapon. Place the target point within 8" of the bearer and roll a Scatter Dice and an Artillery Dice. If a misfire symbol is rolled, place the point of impact over the center of the bearer. If a number is rolled, determine the point of impact in the following way: If the Scatter Dice shows a hit symbol, the target point is the point of impact. If the Scatter Dice does not show a hit symbol, scatter the target point half the distance rolled by the Artillery Dice in the direction indicated by the Scatter Dice. Then place the 3" template with the hole on the point of impact and resolve it. Hits have S4 and ignore armour saves. One use only.

item.name: Deep Pockets
item.description: Bearer and unit automatically pass first break test. Cannot be used in a turn the bearer refused a challenge. One use only.

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: Tilean Tarot
item.description: PM 3/3+, Clairvoyance: Target one unit on the board. Your opponent has to reveal any hidden models and magic items (but not which model has them) in that unit.

item.name: Badland Banner
item.description: Unit gains +1M.

item.name: Stormspike Standard
item.description: The unit (i.e. each model) gains Impact Hits (1) with S3 for its first successful charge.

item.name: War Banner
Armoured Banner
item.description: +1CR

item.name: Mixed Formation
item.description: All Crossbowmen form the first rank of the unit and all Pikemen form respective ranks behind the Crossbowmen. If the unit suffers casualties, Pikemen are always removed as casualties first, regardless of which models (other than Pirazzo) were actually killed. Only when no Pikemen are left, Crossbowmen are removed as casualties. If Pirazzo is slain, his model is removed and a Pikeman, if available, is turned into a Crossbowman which takes the place of Pirazzo. The unit cannot perform any manoeuvre which would lead to a formation in which the first rank does not consist of all Crossbowmen and no Pikeman.

item.name: Mask of Death
item.description: The bearer and his unit cause Fear.

item.name: Scimitar of Dakisir
item.description: +2S when charging, +1S otherwise.

item.name: Black Banner of the Muktarhin
item.description: +D3 CR

item.name: Blades of the Old Ones
item.description: The model counts as being equipped with a halberd and javelins.

item.name: Cursed Company
item.description: - Each 1W model killed by a cc attack of this unit creates 1 new Fallen Soldier for the unit. - When Richter Kreugar is slain, the Fallen Soldiers start turning to dust. At the end of the phase Richter Kreugar is killed as well as at the start of any of the units following turns, the unit has to take a Ld-test. The unit loses a number of wounds equal to the amount the respective test is failed by. There are no saves of any kind allowed vs wounds suffered in this way. - The unit may only march as long as Richter Kreugar has not been slain.

item.name: Standalone
item.description: The unit does not benefit from Inspiring Presence and Hold Your Ground!. In addition, character models cannot join the unit.

item.name: Undead
item.description: - Immune to Psychology - Crumbling: When an undead unit loses combat it suffers a number of wounds equal to the break test modifier, there is no break test, i.e. undead units never break from combat. Richter Kreugar is only affected if the unit is destroyed and there are unallocated wounds left. There are no saves of any kind allowed vs wounds suffered in this way. - Cause Fear - Undead must choose Hold as charge response, i.e. they may not Stand & Shoot.

item.name: Shadow
item.description: +1S, Killing Blow

item.name: Dark Gem of the Cursed
Bear-Fang Talisman
item.description: Ward Save (4+)

item.name: Banner of Malediction
item.description: The unit lose one less wound from Crumbling.

item.name: Armoured Animosity
item.description: In each of your Start of the Turn phase roll a D6 if the unit has a US of at least 5 and if it is not engaged in combat or broken. On a roll of a 1 the unit suffers from animosity. Roll a D6 and consult the following table to determine the effect: 1-2: Lets show em!: Squabble (see below). In addition, the unit deals D3 S4 hits to the closest unit (friend or foe) within 30". If multiple legal targets are equally close, randomly determine which unit is affected. Casualties inflicted in this way do not cause a panic test. 3- 6 Squabble: The unit may not declare a charge and may not move in the movement phase. Character models cannot join or leave this unit nor can they move inside the unit. All models that are part of the unit cannot shoot in the shooting phase. Spell casting is allowed.

item.name: Ignore Greenskin Panic
item.description: Units with the Greenskins special rule are ignored for determining if this unit has to take a panic test.

item.name: Choppa
item.description: Models on foot gain AP (1) in each first round of combat.

item.name: Minions
item.description: - Animosity: In the Start of the Turn phase roll a D6 if the unit has a US of at least 5 and is not engaged in combat or broken. On a roll of a 1 the unit may not declare a charge or move in this turns movement phase and it may not shoot in this turns shooting phase. - This unit can only be joined by character models with the Minions special rule.

item.name: Pelt of the Wulfag
item.description: The bearer and his unit always have to pursue enemies fleeing from cc. In addition, they roll an additional D6 for determing the pursuit distance.

item.name: Bear Banner
item.description: The unit never loses Frenzy (and regains Frenzy if already lost).

item.name: Slayer Pistols
item.description: The model counts as being equipped with a brace of pistols and all of its cc attacks have S4, AP(1).

item.name: Cold Blooded
item.description: The unit roll 3D6 for Ld-based tests and picks the 2 lowest dice.

item.name: Hit and Run
item.description: If this unit charged and loses or ties combat in the following combat phase, it has to retreat. If this unit won combat, it is allowed to retreat. A retreat follows the same rules as if the unit had to flee from combat but it does not cause panic, the enemy is not allowed to pursue and this unit automatically rallies at the end of the flee movement.

item.name: Thick Skinned
item.description: The mount grants its rider an additional +1AS modifier.

item.name: Manflayer
item.description: This unit can never pursue, even if forced by psychology (e.g. Hatred). Each enemy unit, the Manflayers break or destroy in cc, is worth an additional 100 VP.

item.name: Repeater Handbow
item.description: Range 8", S3, Multiple Shots (3), no penalty for moving and shooting as well as long range; may always Stand & Shoot, even if the enemy is within half charge distance.

item.name: Banner of Kalad
item.description: Units shooting at this unit suffer -1BS (to a minimum of 0) for this attack.

item.name: In Flight Shooting
item.description: Birdmen suffer no penalty for moving and shooting, unless they move on foot.

item.name: Dragonheart Amulet
item.description: Units shooting at Asarnil and Thalui-Sethai suffer -1BS (to a minimum of 0) for this attack.

item.name: Thalui-Sethai
item.description: Thalui-Sethai has the special rules Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Scaly Skin (3+) and Dragon Fire (Breath weapon, S4). In addition, add +1 to rolls on the Monster Reaction Table for Thalui-Sethai. On a natural 6, the player of Asarnil may choose a result of the Monster Reaction Table.

item.name: Mobile
item.description: - Galloper Guns may march. - Galloper Guns may choose Hold or Flee as charge response.

item.name: Galloper Gun
1x Galloper Gun
2x Galloper Gun
3x Galloper Gun
item.description: Cannon, Range 24", S7, no AS, D3 wounds

item.name: Cavalry Artillery Master
item.description:
Bronzino may guide one of the following artillery pieces within 3": - Cannon: may reroll Artillery Dice on roll for point of impact - Galloper Gun: may reroll Artillery Dice on roll for point of impact Declare which warmachine benefits from the buff before you fire the respective warmachine.
Cannot be used when Bronzino is in engaged in cc. If Bronzino is hit by ranged attacks he may transfer hits to a friendly warmachine within 3" on a roll of 4+ per hit. This works like the Look Out Sir! rule (see chapter Characters in the core rules). In addition, Galloper Guns within 6" may use Bronzinos Leadership (Ld).

item.name: Slayerengineer
item.description: f Malakai Makaisson is not engaged in cc and within 3" of the Goblin Hewer, instead of shooting in the shooting phase, he may guide the Goblin Hewer which then uses Malakai Makaissons BS for shooting. If Malakai Makaisson is hit by ranged attacks and within 3" of the Goblin Hewer, he may transfer hits to the Goblin Hewer on a roll of 4+ per hit. This works like the Look Out Sir! rule (see chapter Characters in the core rules).

item.name: Dwarf Repeater Handgun
item.description: Range 24", S4, AP(1), Multiple Shots (3), Move or Fire, no -1 modifier for Stand & Shoot

item.name: Goblin Hewer
item.description: Range 48, S4, AP(1). If the target unit is hit, the target unit suffers D3 hits for each rank of the target unit comprising at least 3 models up to max. 5D3. Target units without a repective rank suffer D3 hits.

item.name: Druid of Albion
item.description: - When Hengus declares one of the Giants (Bologs and Cachtorr) as the target for an Augment, the casting value of the spell is halved (rounded up) for the casting roll. - If Hengus is hit by ranged attacks, he may transfer each hit on a roll of 4+ to one of the Giants (Bologs and Cachtorr) within 3". This works like the Look Out Sir! rule (see chapter Characters in the core rules).

item.name: Oggum Staff
item.description: Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Devine Protection
item.description: Wilhelm as a Warrior Priest may attempt to dispel spells as if he was a wizard.

item.name: Holy Staff
item.description: +2S, automatically wounds all Skaven, Daemons and Undead.

item.name: Stake of Sigmar
item.description: Two-handed. Versus Undead and Daemons the S of the bearer is doubled and each wound causes D3 wounds.

item.name: Gotreks Doom
item.description: Casters (friend or foe) declaring Gortek and Felix as the target for a spell, suffer a miscast on any doubles.

item.name: Slayer
item.description: - Deathblow: Each model, that has been killed before it could attack in the combat phase, is allowed to make 1 last attack (1A) with all special rules directed at the model that killed it. Cannot be used versus Impact Hits. - Doom will have to wait: to-wound rolls of a natural 6 inflict D3 wounds instead of 1. - Professional Killer: If the strength of an attack by this model is less than the toughness of the target, the strength of the attack counts as equal to the toughness of the target.

item.name: Gotreks Axe
item.description: For each hit Gotrek inflicts in cc, Gotrek gets another attack rolling to wound and to hit as normal. Additional attacks do not generate further attacks. In addition, versus models with T5+ inflicted wounds are doubled.

item.name: Karaghul
item.description: +2A. Versus dragons (of any kind) reroll failed to-hit and failed to-wound rolls.

rule.name: E#34
rule.leftTerm: Life BM Master of the Wood (6+)

rule.name: E#50
rule.leftTerm: Heaven PM Second Sign of Amul (5+)

rule.name: E#51
rule.leftTerm: Beast BM Howl of the Beast (8+)

rule.name: E#60
rule.leftTerm: Death BM Dark Hand of Death (5+)

rule.name: E#77
rule.leftTerm: Fire PM Flaming Sword of Rhuin (5+)

rule.name: E#89
rule.leftTerm: Metal BM Destillation of Molten Silver (9+)

rule.name: E#91
rule.leftTerm: Metal BM Rule of Burning Iron (6+)

rule.name: E#92
rule.leftTerm: Metal BM Spirit of the Forge (9+)
